content.question: The position of an object moving along the <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math>-axis is described by <math alttext="x of t equals, 5 times t squared, minus t cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>âˆ’</mo><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math> where <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi></math> is in meters and <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> is time in seconds. What is the average velocity of the object during the time interval from <math alttext="t equals 1 second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext> s</mtext></math> to <math alttext="t equals 3 seconds" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext> s</mtext></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="1 meter per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math>
<math alttext="5 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>5</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math>
<math alttext="7 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>7</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math>
<math alttext="12 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>12</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="7 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>7</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>m/s</mtext></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
